channel.title: Omg - server
channel.description: can someone please help me in my server everytime i delete it and make anotherone it stays for one day and then it keeps error connecting or no response from server though it's fully online and portforwarded right but it keeps saying that so what should i do anyone can help me i'm using hybrid pvp source and client and server ip is pvp-own546.no-ip.biz so can someone help me please. :(

item.title: Omg - server
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“skullz scoop, post:5, topic:407982”][quote author=Thanks link=topic=509266.msg3694779#msg3694779 date=1312354807]
If you have utorrent running that sometimes causes the problem make sure to end the process.

Do you have a static IP?

Meaning the ip will always be the same.
[/quote]

i’m using utorrent for it and my ip isn’t static but i can make it static but will something happen to computer if i made it because when i click it says something like thats so what should i do[/quote]You MUST have a static ip.

Read full topic

skullz scoop:

i’m using utorrent

That’s why it’s not working, Utorrent is a horrible way to port forward

item.title: Omg - server
item.dc:creator: @skullz_scoop skullz scoop
item.description:
@skullz_scoop wrote:

tb:

if you mess up your internet will stop connecting, you should portforward the real way instead of using utorrent if you wanna avoid this problem. Otherwise you should get use to it because utorrent hasn’t had good updates for a while.

how do i portforward the real way please tell me i will give you admin in server if it worked

Read full topic

item.description:

If it say’s error connecting the obviously you didn’t port forward right.

it was online yesterday and everyone logged in and also when i went to canyouseeme.org port 43594 was succes so i portforwarded right and on runelocas my server ip was online but idk what to do now.
